name: Mark Martins
description: Some times I have a wild adventurous side of me, I definitely have morals and integrity but some time it guide my behavior in some ways or another. I don’t play games with people’s heart or their feelings. I am very ambitious and intelligent, I also have a wonderful attitude about life. I have a wonderful sense of humor. I can easily adapt to most situations. I love to travel, explore new things, catch a movie, or read a book, I love listening to variety of music, I enjoy sharing a meaningful, intimate conversation with my partner. I believe in communication, honesty, trust and respect are very important in any relationship I’m involved in. I am a very romantic, affectionate, sensual and very passionate man. I would never make you feel unappreciated or neglected, nor I would take you for granted. I will always be willing to compromise, and treat you the way you want to be treated,tell me you past experiences, all i want is for you talk care us you, me and my son and you know your family will be mine as well my responsibility
